ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] any day now?
ygData.msgSnippet: i wish.  i hit 49, got less than a bubb, and have been there ever since.  i am too worried about maxing shada before expansion.  she was at barely a sliver of
ygData.messageBody:
i wish. i hit 49, got less than a bubb, and have been there ever since. i
am too worried about maxing shada before expansion. she was at barely a
sliver of 50 left, i got as close to 49 as possible without un-dinging. i
got her back up to almost 3 bubbs. once she is maxed i will start working
on tyria again =) of course being 50 is more important for a bard, being 49
is enough for a wiz for now.

Shada

>
> *waits for that 49 to tick over to 50....*
>
> Maravana Vireo
> 50th Bard
> Jus Divinum
> Mithaniel Marr
